mapper.select: select ID, name, type, style, area, visible, coverPath, planPath, time, designer from plan where visible = 1
select ID, name, type, style, area, visible, coverPath, planPath, time, designer from plan order by ID desc limit 3
select ID, name, type, style, area, visible, coverPath, planPath, time, designer from plan where TagID = #{ID}
mapper.insert: insert into plan(name, type, style, area, visible, coverPath, planPath, designer) values(#{name}, #{type}, #{style}, #{area}, #{visible}, #{coverPath}, #{planPath}, #{designer})
